name: ENGAGEMENT SESSION
details: Practice for your wedding day during your engagement session, and in turn, feel like a pro day-of. You'll see how I guide you and help you to look and feel awesome. And within a couple of weeks, you'll have photos to use for your Save the Dates.

name: WEDDING COVERAGE
details: Be at ease knowing you'll have all of the important moments, people, and details you want to have photographed with the right amount of hours of coverage. And within a couple of weeks, you'll have photos to use for your Save the Dates.

name: PERSPECTIVE VIEWS
details: Get even more photos of your day. And from two different perspectives. The moments you aren't a part of and the naturally emotional ones are just some instances having a second photographer just makes logical sense.

name: PHOTO BOOTH
details: Make it easy for your guests to have even more fun on your wedding day. The INSTA is a non-traditional photo booth built for INSTANT delivery of photos, GIFs, and boomerangs​​​​​​​ to save and share on social. Just you and your guest’s awesome selves!
